name: RetrieveLocationCustomAttributeDefinition
description:
Retrieve a location's custom attribute definition.

Use this tool to obtain the custom attribute definition for a specified location in a Square seller account. Ensure the attribute's visibility is set appropriately to access it.

parameters.name: custom_attribute_key
parameters.description: The key for the custom attribute definition to retrieve, using the qualified key if not the owner.

value_schema.description:
The key of the custom attribute definition to retrieve. If the requesting application
is not the definition owner, you must use the qualified key.

parameters.name: current_custom_attribute_version
parameters.description: The version number of the custom attribute definition for consistent reads. Must match the current or higher version.

value_schema.description:
The current version of the custom attribute definition, which is used for strongly consistent
reads to guarantee that you receive the most up-to-date data. When included in the request,
Square returns the specified version or a higher version if one exists. If the specified version
is higher than the current version, Square returns a `BAD_REQUEST` error.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description:

parameters.description:

value_schema.description:

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
